snippet.title: Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hidden Through Time 2: Discovery is coming to PC, Switch, PS5 & Xbox on August 13th 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1094680

Ignite your imagination, unleash your inner artist with the editor and share your masterpieces with the world! Mark your calendars for August 13th and be among the first to discover the magic.

Join the Discord:  https://discord.gg/yYJ4UHRQX7  
Follow Rogueside on Twitter:  https://x.com/RoguesideGames
